main_help:
Game set-up commands:
Use 'place <ship name> on <coordinate 1> <coordinate 2>' to place a ship on the board.
Use 'place random' to randomly place all of your ships. 
Use 'ready' when your board is set up and ready to play.

Gameplay commands:
Use 'shoot <coordinate>' or 's <coordinate>' to shoot that location.
Use 'status' to see what your opponent did in the last move.
Use 'quit' to quit the game at any point.
main_move:
: Please make your move.
Use 'shoot <coordinate>' or 's <coordinate>' to shoot that location.
Use 'status' to see what ships you have left.
Use 'quit' to quit the game.
main_setup:
: Please set up your board.
Use 'place <ship name> on <coordinate 1> <coordinate 2>'
Use 'place random' to place all your ships randomly
Use 'ready' when all your ships are placed to continue.
main_offboard:
You cannot place the ship there.
Please enter coordinates that are on the board.
main_misaligned: You cannot place the ship with those coordinates. Coordinates must be in the same row or column.
main_wronglength: You cannot place this ship with those coordinates. The ship must have the right length.
main_invalidname: You cannot place that ship. Please enter a valid ship name.
main_overlapping: You cannot place that ship there. There is already a ship on those coordinates. Try placing the ship on a different location.
main_dup_shot: You've already shot there! Try shooting somewhere else!
main_place_game_error: You can't move your ships during the game!
main_shoot_setup_error: You cannot shoot until you begin playing.
main_ready_setup_error: No you're not! Make sure all your ships are placed.
main_status_setup_error: You cannot check your game status until you begin playing.
main_mine_number: How many mines would you like to put on the boards: 0 to 10
main_lose_message: : You lost! Better luck next time!
